member.name: MF_URL_TRUST_STATUS
member.summary: Indicates whether the URL is from a trusted source.

member.name: MF_URL_TRUST_STATUS.MF_LICENSE_URL_UNTRUSTED
member.summary: The validity of the URL cannot be guaranteed because it is not signed. The application should warn the user.

member.name: MF_URL_TRUST_STATUS.MF_LICENSE_URL_TRUSTED
member.summary: The URL is the original one provided with the content.

member.name: MF_URL_TRUST_STATUS.MF_LICENSE_URL_TAMPERED
member.summary: The URL was originally signed and has been tampered with. The file should be considered corrupted, and the application should not navigate to the URL without issuing a strong warning the user.
